cad203069b60c580.voiceContent: Hey! Perfect timing. There's something I need to talk to you about. Something important. Has to be face to face.

3ba2f0e7d7fcb8b8.voiceContent: Haha... All we're missing now is a catchy chant...

c0c64adf977fff39.voiceContent: All you'd have to do is stand back and root for me. At the top of your voice, you know, really giving it all you've got. When it comes to the atmosphere, you've gotta go big or go home!

95971e4a085f0876.voiceContent: Guess that settles it then. When I'm not around, promise me you'll carry on being a champ and living life to the max.

9106f2385af97414.voiceContent: Hah! Guess it's time for the Arataki Gang to start expanding into other nations!

a6bdd45af3f6ec18.voiceContent: I've slept on the streets, down at the dock, deep in the forest... Pretty much everywhere! Of course, comfort-wise, the cells at the Police Station are up there at the top of the list.

4461d15910798505.voiceContent: You do you have a point though — swapping out one kind of bug for another won't necessarily improve my odds of winning...

9bb63b1cbafddb5d.voiceContent: Maybe it's time to make a clean break, you know? To stop wasting my time on things which just don't matter.

e49a8e292476d9c2.voiceContent: Don't you worry now, I've got your back wherever you go. Whether you're cruising the city or wandering the wilds, my boys will be there!

88ba7cdcd916a3cd.voiceContent: You gotta be there, what, every other day? They seem to work you pretty hard, so...

cce0ecd229c7c7d2.voiceContent: Hahaha, right, there's that too! I was just kidding, of course. My mind never even went there.

741170ede60d68e7.voiceContent: So this, uh, Adventurers' Guild — what kind of things do they do? And which tasks do you normally take?

5600d2c4388ec418.voiceContent: That makes this a family matter, you get it? Which means, leave it to Itto!

c6f4660002dda5d5.voiceContent: Ahem... I was hoping for more of a sorry, I didn't ask you to help, Itto than a thank you!

19d662e5b77a2f3c.voiceContent: I'mma put my boys on the case! Many hands make light work and all that, y'know...

6083621f84a4754b.voiceContent: That was all before I met you, though.

66b7e813860167b4.voiceContent: Welcome to stronghold numero two of the Arataki Gang, haha!

597e7a1ba239aa6c.voiceContent: So, what're you up to today, huh? Need my help with anything? Whatever it is, just say the word and Itto is on the case!

e9efb350e1b6eee2.voiceContent: Not about the bugs... like how? Are you saying I should go for a boar instead? Or a bird maybe? Nah... too much hard work!

fe517ecfc34590bf.voiceContent: Ummm... Okay, okay, I think I got something Arataki Itto, the strongest in his class! Meet him on the street-o, he'll make you kiss his feet-o!

287b2e52b0970999.voiceContent: Send me anywhere in the world — anywhere at all — and I guarantee you I'd be able to live there.

2cd221259961668c.voiceContent: I've been doing some thinking over the last couple of days about how I keep losing my Onikabuto fights, and, well... I'm starting to think that maybe I should just give it up now.

e532bb633e383e37.voiceContent: Playing at night takes it to a whole other level. Seriously, I'm preparing to go full oni on you here — so make sure you find a good hiding spot, capiche!?

b70dd43839ca0cd4.voiceContent: Anyway... point made, boom. I'm not gonna drag it out like some... granny at a tea party.

6375596b8198132e.voiceContent: Come on, sleep is for the weak! Not champions like you and I! You wanna play some Hide-and-Seek?

b8370049e44ac436.voiceContent: Uh... is that a trick question? This is me we're talking about...

2f5ef39df6131be6.voiceContent: The kids I battle with might talk a whole lot, and sure, there's a few pranksters among them — but they're no cheaters!

eb420040898caddf.voiceContent: And when I say being a champ — that means kicking some serious butt, alright? I don't care if you're playing card games or you're brawling — no losing! Not to anyone!

31620d3746c68dae.voiceContent: You bet — I'm giving up Onikabuto fights for good! From this day forward, it's Fireflies all the way, baby!

92a406be4f55b751.voiceContent: Next time, I don't wanna hear oh right, Itto wants to help. I wanna hear darn right, Itto wants to help! Got it?

3de2801fa8b7058b.voiceContent: Ah, except... only in Inazuma. How am I supposed to protect you if you leave?

647a38b75c32e3ae.voiceContent: Wait, what do you mean, oh right!? C'mon, that's hurtful, where's the enthusiasm?

3f0cac31533970e5.voiceContent: Haha, that's the spirit! That's what makes you part of my crew.

5f8bdb3e39e96151.voiceContent: Luckily for me, you're not like them at all You and I are like an absolute powerhouse together!

50821cd6cb33b9d6.voiceContent: Sound good? Haha. Alright, let's practice it together now!

919f277274bae6d1.voiceContent: Wait... what? You're hitting the hay already?

073b702900644882.voiceContent: This place is something else! In fact, I'm gonna go on the record and say that the comfort level here is like 10... No, what am I saying — 100 prison cells rolled into one!

9fa321a6c25f6149.voiceContent: The people? Nah! No way. Not possible!

ddce81467d4943d0.voiceContent: Anyway, whatever. At the end of the day, I just haven't found the bug for me. Ugh, seems like you can't go looking for a strong companion, you've gotta wait for the right one to come along...

d7be2cbbf52ee199.voiceContent: Every single member of my gang is like family to me. And, you know... same goes for you.

02a35ed36f3f32ca.voiceContent: I see you as a member of the Arataki Gang! You do know that, don't you?

952e87f90ca9fef2.voiceContent: I know you've asked other people for help in the past, so why not me, huh? What's that about?

097e2e9c2062a94c.voiceContent: If it's okay with you, I might actually make this my main pad. It's a sweet deal, I'm pretty psyched at the idea of crashing here every night...

c88fdc8408994c63.voiceContent: Haha! Seriously though, I'm just telling it how it is. I think we're past the point where we need to be polite to each other all the time.

c4ce7284a17590e7.voiceContent: But the code of the streets says I should find a way to express my, uh, you know, gratitude... but, I know... I—I can be your bouncer here!

4ed45ec9e6959d1b.voiceContent: If we ever got into a situation where a fight was unavoidable, naturally I'd be the one to take it for the team.

0cf7cea625cb33b7.voiceContent: Anyway, look me in the eyes, and listen up, okay? This place is awesome!

31b58cf1730d1c0e.voiceContent: ...Time to get serious, though. Let's pick a stall and go head-to-head, winner takes it all!

1036e6bc3486c06c.voiceContent: Let's go kick back in the shade. I'll tell you all my epic tales from roaming the wilds of Inazuma!

b372eee92fad4717.voiceContent: The loser has to, uhh... has to run around the place three times while shouting to the winner, All Hail, King of the Festival!

21afe2ab24da463a.voiceContent: Whoa, check it out, this looks just like Granny Oni's place...

7bb500b353400b3d.voiceContent: Pretty sweet. The scenery's really makin' my day!

b802dafadd126e31.voiceContent: Oh boy, you did not disappoint. This festive street is exactly my scene!

e9740c55af7f7fcc.voiceContent: Hey! Who's sneaking around over there! C'mon, show yourself!

53f1e601a810eb32.voiceContent: Whoa, sounds like someone forgot to invite us to the fight... Let's go and help him!

012b12fb87cea7df.voiceContent: This place is actually pretty cool. If we weren't in such a hurry to get out, we could kick back and enjoy the scenery a little.

6c4e22f1fe8213cc.voiceContent: Alriiiight! New toys for the boys!

7dc71ee0eed5999a.voiceContent: Hello, free money, goodbye working for a living.

60226f2f20b4abf3.voiceContent: Tag me in! I got this!

332109ac4f7551c6.voiceContent: At least I'm going down... with style...

6fdbba67240c26d4.voiceContent: Step aside! Itto's back in town!

f31f72a2de292acc.voiceContent: I'm the head honcho of the Arataki Gang, and everyone knows my name...s. Names, I have many. Arataki The One and Oni Itto, Arataki The Oni Sumo King Itto, Arataki The Pride of Oni Itto, Arataki Beetle Gladiator Itto, Arataki The Ultimate TCG Champion Itto, Arataki He Might Lose but He'll Never Admit Defeatto... Anyway, these are some of the ones I usually go by, so go ahead, take your pick. I'll respond to whichever one you choose, I promise. Hehe, you're welcome.

6126c1477dba34a2.voiceContent: Arataki Numero Uno Itto, here in the flesh! Hahaha... *cough*

bb97df4fac7b18c5.voiceContent: Best flavor in the world? The sweet, sweet taste of victory. And that's why I've never spent a single Mora on any of my snacks — I've won 'em all fair and square... That's right.

624fa559283a7274.voiceContent: Don't underestimate the beetle — they can be some of the toughest little guys around! Yes you can, yes you can— Wanna know what's on this beetle's diet? Sweat and tears, that's what! That's how it gets stronger... I think we can all learn somethin' from that!

62572d0a5710bdb4.voiceContent: Pff, real men don't carry umbrellas... Oh boy, wow, it's really starting to pick up. Uh quick, c'mon, get yours out! C'mon, quick, quick, quick!

fa5aa831d5f41917.voiceContent: Hey! Raiden Shogun, is that you? Well guess what — you're not the boss of me. Uh-huh, that's right, you heard me! Go ahead, strike me down!

79bef461f827af52.voiceContent: Bottom line Never let the wind get to you. Especially when you've got a killer hairstyle like mine. Oh yeah!

17c0602bdccf6f2b.voiceContent: Alright, it's time for a snowball fight! You're never gonna win, though, I... Ha, ah... Ah-choo!!! Whew.

4acfeef01e3bdec6.voiceContent: The sky is clear and the sun is shining... Time to get the Onikabuto out for some training! C'mon little guy, let's go!

8f066030486e1e86.voiceContent: Morning, sunshine! Hey, uh... So listen, I'm fresh out of Mora... again. But hey, who needs some lousy job when we can just go find somewhere fun to hang out! Haha, whaddya say?

500b8bbe6aad66c2.voiceContent: Now that we've had some grub, why don't we go find somewhere to kick it for a while? Hanamizaka? Nah, boring. Tenryou Commission... No, no, no... Ah, forget it, let's go hang around Ritou!

584c5ef1325ee30c.voiceContent: Shh! You hear that? *gasp* Oh no... it's a ghost, RUN!!! ... Haha, psyche! Ah, I got you good there! ... I got you, didn't I?

d3550cfcb9d351e4.voiceContent: If you're tired, go ahead and call it a night. Hmm? Me? Oh, don't worry... I sleep with my eyes open... Haha... Literally.

6b9920ce9c2563eb.voiceContent: Oh, so they're saying I can't hold down a real job, huh? Well! Hahaha! Sorry to break it to ya, but I'm a delinquent. That means it's my job to not have a real job, and if anyone's got a problem with that... Who's got a problem with that, huh? You got a problem with that!? You got a problem with— *coughing* Sorry. Got a little worked up there. Where was I? Ah yeah, so work isn't really my thing, but don't worry — I don't rob or steal or anything like that. When I'm really runnin' low on funds, I just take the odd job here and there to make ends meet. You know, like transporting stuff, delivering documents, helping businesses attract customers... Just enough to keep the wolf from the door. Hehe!

bd400d331f481415.voiceContent: The oni have been through a lot to get to where we are today, and look at us now — living peacefully alongside the humans. Unfortunately, there's still plenty of people out there who've got a bone to pick with us. Hmm? Change? Oh yeah, things are gonna change, alright! You can count on that! But I'll tell you what, it won't involve any sucking up to the humans on my part, nuh-uh! I'm gonna let my actions do the talkin'. They'll come to respect me eventually.

b74910060826f7b4.voiceContent: You know what, I gotta admit — I respect you, always have. I could really see you as a member of the gang, you know — I mean, you really have what it takes... Whaddya say? I've even come up with a catchy title to tag on after your name, get this The Traveler, 'Second to One'! Get it? 'Cause y'know, I'm numero uno, you're my number two, and together we're the most powerful duo in the whole friggin' world, baby! Hahaha! Ah... But, uh, all jokes aside, I know you're on some important journey or whatever. So, go ahead! Get out there and do whatcha wanna do! Just remember, the Arataki Gang will always answer your call.

bd24d84394437379.voiceContent: Hey, so I always see you running around everywhere doing this and that for other people, but you're not in it for the Mora, are you? No, you're just straight-up lookin' out for your fellow man. I know a true homie when I see one, and no one appreciates a homies' homie more than yours truly. Put it here, partner! You and I are gonna make a great team, I just know it!

0d10e75e2d95fbb3.voiceContent: Ugh, don't even ask. Just the thought of it makes my blood boil! First, the Shogun's Army goes out and steals everyone's precious Visions — which, already a heinous crime, right? But then... then they go and stick them all over that statue with absolutely no sense of organization whatsoever. I mean, think about it... the more powerful the Vision, the higher up on the statue it should go, that would make sense, right? But nooo, some class-A jerk in the Tenryou Commission thought it'd be funny to put my Vision right at the very bottom! Ugh... Come on!

b7fd7de2a25cd564.voiceContent: If you ever have something on your mind, you can always try writing in to That's Life magazine's advice column. Ms. Hina always manages to come up with an encouraging and heartwarming response for all her readers. Just look at me — I used to be a lost soul, but not anymore, and it's all thanks to her. Oh, that reminds me, I managed to sign up for one of her upcoming meet-and-greets! I've been counting down the days — wish it would go faster...

f9565f24ec262e7e.voiceContent: Wanna know the real secret to catching Onikabuto? It's all in the eyeballs. You gotta keep those bad boys squeaky clean at all times, make sure your eyesight's as sharp as a hawk. Trust me, when you're in the middle of a thunderstorm, and the rain's coming down, and the wind's blowing in your face, you gotta watch out, because Lavender Melons and Onikabuto? Well, they can really start to look the same... believe me, I know.

ab46aaedb375ce7c.voiceContent: Some of the boys have been telling me that he was the star of the show at the Vision Hunt Ceremony. I'm like — are you kidding me??? How come he gets his own special ceremony!? Was the hundredth Vision supposed to be, like, stronger than the other ninety-nine, or something? Pff, nah, it can't have been that, 'cause, uh, hello! They would've chosen me if that's what they were going for.

9934b430f426c7b7.voiceContent: Haha, I only wish I could have met my bro Ayato sooner. He really taught me something. You can kindle the warrior spirit in even the weakest of bugs... Yep, I really took that one to heart. If it weren't for those words of wisdom, I'm pretty sure I would have given up beetle fighting after losing for the 780th time... Heh, I guess sometimes it takes a warrior to understand a warrior. When we're playing trading card games or battling beetles, we're always totally on the same wavelength.

315ca2c36b59b69c.voiceContent: Hmph, she's always showing off her fancy fireworks and toys to the kids. Well, I'm sick of it! Nobody steals my thunder! I'm the one that's supposed to be adored by the kids! Me! That goes for you too, you're siding with me on this, okay... Huh? Whaddya mean, you're not a kid? Eh, details. If you're shorter than me, you're a kid as far as I'm concerned.

e48c242527976a88.voiceContent: You know what, yeah, she beat me during the Vision Hunt Decree. I'm not ashamed to admit it. When you lose, you admit defeat, and when you screw up, you take it on the chin, like a man! And anyway, let's not forget which one of us won't agree to a rematch — her, the tengu warrior! It's just a sumo street fight, I mean, what's she so afraid of? If she keeps snubbing me, I'm gonna have to stop calling her Kujou Tengu and start calling her Kujou Chicken! Heh, we'll see what she thinks of that.

26dc26c94a34709b.voiceContent: Oh yeah, the doggy general in the resistance... Hey, I've gotta hand it to him, he may be on the small side, but he's got quite the fighting spirit. Also, he gives off this vibe that makes me feel all warm and fuzzy inside, almost as if he understands my innermost feelings... I mean, I've barely met the guy, so that's kinda weird.

8824e4123647660b.voiceContent: Nobody questions my leadership in the gang, what I say goes — except when it comes to Shinobu. She's always challenging everything I say. And not only that — all the hard-earned loot I bring back and share with everyone? She goes and returns it! But also, she gets me out of jail, and out of every mess we get ourselves into, so I'll let it slide. Besides, I don't wanna get on her bad side... An angry Shinobu would make my life a nightmare.

fcd9288f896686c5.voiceContent: Word on the street is that he blocked the Musou no Hitotachi after you escaped from Tenshukaku. Seriously? 'Cause I mean, that is awesome! Who knows how he pulled it off. Hey, now that I think about it, he's from a fallen clan, and I'm from a fallen clan... That kinda makes us equals, haha! Yeah, so next time someone attacks you, it's my turn to block the blade!

45865bf50a3bf27e.voiceContent: During the Vision Hunt Decree, the Shogun had to send her top tengu in person to get my Vision off me. Heh, means she must have found me to be quite the pain in the neck. But, y'know, she's abolished the Vision Hunt Decree now, so no hard feelings, I guess. As long as she's learned her lesson, of course. 'Cause if she pulls something like that again, this old pain in the neck will be back with a vengeance.

79e1b17bc5189946.voiceContent: I crushed that Kitsune Ramen eating contest we had. Even all that Fried Tofu couldn't stand in my way — she didn't come close to beating me! ... I was, uh, bedridden for more than a month after that, but you know what? I'd rather lie in bed a winner than walk away a loser! So... Anyway, I had the last laugh, 'cause she had to foot the bill for 32 bowls of noodles! Haha!

eba9f44ea37da116.voiceContent: I know what you're thinking I don't see it — how did this guy get to become the boss of the Arataki Gang on the back of beetle fighting and trading card games? Well, you're right, those are just child's play. Wanna know the hard skills that really got me where I am? Eating ramen standing upside down, sleeping with my eyes open, playing the harmonica with my nose, and swatting houseflies with my hair. Yeah, I know. Betcha see it now, huh?

5bee22576fc9e779.voiceContent: People in Inazuma have this ritual every time there's a holiday, or they move, or get sick, or whatever, where they throw beans around and chant Fortune beans are falling down, send the oni out of town. Fortune in, oni out. Fortune in, oni out! ...Ugh, the chant gets worse every time I hear it, but the streets full of beans, with my allergies? Total disaster. I've gotta fix this, for every oni out there! We're innocent, people! Quit trying to ward us off and drive us out every time there's a minor life event!

da30c85fb329c9f8.voiceContent: In a... attempt... to end human prejudice toward the oni, I had the gang use a Kamera to take a picture of me showing my softer side and stick it to the Message Board in Inazuma City. Next thing we know, some jerks have graffitied all over it! Tsk! Then, some ashigaru blockheads from the Tenryou Commission accused me of disrupting the peace, next it was the Yashiro Commission, complaining it ruined the atmosphere in the area, and finally, even the Kanjou Commission got involved — they sent some lackeys over demanding advertising tax! Ugh, they have no idea who the bad guys are here!

e8b3d626b7d6a7ab.voiceContent: In the Arataki Gang, we're proud to welcome people who've experienced adversity in their lives. Don't listen to the people who call us freaks, or weirdos. Every member of my gang is like family to me, and they all feel the same way. Whatever happens, the gang will face it together — both the highs and the lows.

3e14642dc27a4f62.voiceContent: I gotta respect the Blue Oni for sacrificing themselves so that the Crimson Oni could live on... In principle, though, I'm absolutely against it. No one should have to sacrifice their own kind for the sake of a better tomorrow, period. It's only a better tomorrow if it's a better tomorrow for everyone. We need to work together, not have everyone just focused on themselves, making their own sacrifice, trying to look cool in the process... Eh, I guess there's no changing the past, what's done is done. But from this day forward, no more sacrificing, not on my watch! You go to sacrifice yourself, I'll stand right in your way!

3b0241a3c8343672.voiceContent: Beetle fighting, trading card games, spinning tops, kendama, hide-and-seek, you name it, I can play it! Whaddya say, pick one and we'll have a little contest? Just make sure you're ready to get thrashed! Hahaha!

4342c736d0fe5c87.voiceContent: Granny Oni isn't an oni at all... In fact, she's the kindest human that has ever lived. She only got her nickname because she took me in. If people have got a problem with me, fine, I don't care what other people think anyway... *sigh* But I wish people wouldn't go after her because of me.

46313cca5a5da5c5.voiceContent: Lollipops are pretty much the best things ever. The candy tastes awesome, but also, it looks really cool just having a stick hanging out of your mouth. It gives me, like... a real punk kind of vibe. Here, you try it!

d59288ce043214e7.voiceContent: Uh, well I am an oni! So there's nothing I hate more than beans. Soybeans, Mung Beans, whatever, I hate 'em all. Just touching one is enough to set off my allergies, let alone eating them. We have to get people to resist this constant urge to throw beans everywhere!

3df9ed97b390b9a2.voiceContent: Hahahahahahahaha! Mm, mm, mm! I haven't eaten somethin' this good in three whole years!

5c1cabbc3c580da8.voiceContent: Fine! I'll let you treat me to a meal today, but know that the Arataki Gang always pays its debts.

0934612bb7f2962c.voiceContent: Hey, are you sure you ain't trying to poison me!? Ah!

58de1f3dce5b34f1.voiceContent: Today's an important day. I had to send the gang away, otherwise they'd be accusing me of favoritism. Here, take a look at this. I got you the greatest birthday gift combo ever! One top-grade Onikabuto — I'll have you know it took me three whole days and nights to catch this bad boy — one out-of-print collectible trading card that took me 300 rounds to get my hands on, and finally, a birthday song performance performed personally by yours truly! Happy Birthday to you, Happy Birthday to you, Happy Biiiirthday dear Traveler, Happy Birthday to youuuu!

9d1bb4506301f641.voiceContent: Now that's what I'm talking about, baby! Woo-haha! Better look out, I'm way stronger now!

42e0a648346ebc9e.voiceContent: Ah yeah, this is gonna do wonders for my win ratio!

f0af48412c7f4da7.voiceContent: Feel the power, baby! Wanna see me smash a boulder?

96743a38fdec14fc.voiceContent: I think Numero Uno just went from nickname to reality, boom! Haha! Hey, but just because I made it to the top doesn't mean I'm gonna forget all the things you've done for me, okay? I've still got your back, anytime, anywhere.

89094bafac7c3732.voiceContent: I'm not losing! It's all... part of the plan...

0afcbda7694a0d7b.voiceContent: It's just a scratch, I swear!

b8446ba40ef8a5af.voiceContent: My boys... I've let you down...

488071087ae5cee5.voiceContent: All I did was give her a little pat on the head this one time when she wasn't looking, and now, she pounces to attack every time she lays eyes on me. Haha, what can I say? Tanuki are adorable! What am I supposed to do — not pat one on the head? ...Oh yeah, and that's the other thing — she beats you up for calling her a tanuki, too! What's up with that? I mean, a tanuki's what she's going for, right? Sheesh, talk about getting your fur all ruffled over nothing...

3561cbc8b1c6d7db.voiceContent: Question for ya! Do my horns look boring once you get used to them? 'Cause, uh, I was thinking of switching up the style, going for a total overhaul, you know? I'm thinking paint them in rainbow stripes and then strap a few Fireflies on for good measure! Eh, eh? I bet that would turn some heads on the streets... like Dude, you're rockin' those sweet rainbow horns, man! ...Ah, man, this is totally genius! I'm gonna round up the gang and get them working on it ASAP.

a3c0e39d6aee318a.voiceContent: Hah! Is that all you got!?

e52d7182fad09393.voiceContent: Hahahahahahahaha! Mm, mm, mm! I haven't eaten somethin' this good in three whole years!

1fb8239b61c816ed.voiceContent: Fine! I'll let you treat me to a meal today, but know that the Arataki Gang always pays its debts.

48aaab04f60a050b.voiceContent: Hey, are you sure you ain't trying to poison me!? Ah!

da052b50516ba526.voiceContent: Say hello to the number one card deck in Teyvat!

314bda47a7208de2.voiceContent: You're leaving already? Well, I got a few more games to win — before I leave, everyone in this tavern's gonna know about Arataki The Ultimate TCG Champion Itto!

28a3faa92c57b67a.voiceContent: Hahaha, this is what you get when you combine top-tier card skills with just a little dash of luck!

1e23362fe923276a.voiceContent: Booya! And THAT is why they call me Arataki The Ultimate TCG Champion Itto!

8032d1af48b8eff1.voiceContent: You're just in time! Come join me for a few rounds!

4a4959591db7ea89.voiceContent: That, my friend, is what you get when you combine a butt-kicking card deck with raw oni power! Hahahaha, thank you very much!

9c7abf6025a767c8.voiceContent: ...Don't get too smug, 'cause next time, I'mma take back what I've lost and then some! Just you wait!

3ce8990bd22b60a6.voiceContent: Hey! You weren't cheating, were you? Your cards, show 'em!

7e192c9fad585443.voiceContent: Wait, I'm just getting warmed up here! I demand a rematch!

82a918b15abd7b7d.voiceContent: Alright, let's do this thing! Prepare to get crushed!

abb0699c68967f84.voiceContent: Hahaha! Now you see what the champ is capable of!

11ca001840e7eb59.voiceContent: Eh, eh? Now you know who you're messin' with.

a4ebd20f777ecef6.voiceContent: I let you have that one.

774e60317f566d24.voiceContent: Wow! Hold on, hold ooooon! Would you just chill?
